topics.body: Apparently, a fossil collector in Thailand was looking at another collector's collection when the other collector's pet tiger suddenly walked into the living room with him. The collector was so freaked out that he ran into the bathroom while the tiger's owner was pissing himself laughing.

topics.body:
I figured out why Ed Elric is seen as a well rounde character: he has his own goals, balanced with helping others.

Think about it. Most mainstream anime protags have overly simplistic goals like Become Hokage or I Fight For My Friends. Ed has his own goal (foxing his brother after human transmuting his mother), bevoming a good alchemist and helping others out
